layout.singingstanza: Pass me not, O gen -- tle Sav -- ior, Hear my hum -- ble cry; While on oth -- ers Thou art call -- ing, Do not pass me by. Sav -- ior, Sav -- ior, Hear my hum -- ble cry; While on oth -- ers Thou art call -- ing, Do not pass me by.

lyrics.stanza: Pass me not, O gentle Savior, Hear my humble cry; While on others Thou art calling, Do not pass me by.
Savior, Savior, Hear my humble cry; While on others Thou art calling, Do not pass me by.
Let me at Thy throne of mercy Find a sweet relief; Kneeling there in deep contrition, Help my unbelief.
Trusting only in Thy merit, Would I seek Thy face; Heal my wounded, broken spirit, Save me by Thy grace.
Thou the spring of all my comfort, More than life to me; Whom have I on earth beside Thee? Whom in heaven but Thee?
